name: Pure Happiness Coffee v.01.1
description:
You wake from peculiar dreams to do what? Make a cup of coffee of course! 

Pure Happiness Coffee v.01.1 is an interactive non-linear short fiction dedicated to the joy and pleasure of drinking the best coffee in the world. 

Featuring cameos from Standout Coffee, Loveless Coffee, Black and White Coffee, Wilder Lasso, Ivan Solis, Sebastian Gomez, Jairo Arcila, Edwin Fehrenbach, Hario V60, Kalita Wave, The Chemex, Standart Magazine, and Not Neutral. 

Enjoy a cup of coffee like you never have before. 

This is my first foray into interactive coffee fiction. Let me know if you'd like to see more! 

If you enjoyed playing Pure Happiness Coffee, please consider donating a couple bucks to support future projects!

follow on instagram: @purehappinesscoffee

&/or sign up for our newsletter!

Thanks for playing!
